channel.title: Whoever helps me
channel.description:
Hello I'm having a problem with my new 562 server compiler. I have everything right in the compiler so don't even ask that. I know I have to compile it as an administrator because I have windows 7, but I still get the same thing... This is my code I use:
[code=text]@echo off title rs2hd compiler echo Preparing... mkdir bin cd src copy log4j.xml .. cd .. move log4j.xml bin/ echo Compiling nets... "C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/net/*.java echo Compiling models... "C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/model/*.java echo Compiling packet handlers... "C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/packethandler/*.java echo Compiling utils... "C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/util/*.java echo Compiling shops... "C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/content/Shops.java "C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/content/ShopHandler.java echo Complete. pause[/code]
This is the error I get every time:
[code=text]Preparing... A subdirectory or file bin already exists. The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannot find the file specified. The system cannot find the file specified. Compiling nets... javac: file not found: src\com\rs2hd\net\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Compiling models... javac: file not found: src\com\rs2hd\model\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Compiling packet handlers... javac: file not found: src\com\rs2hd\packethandler\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Compiling utils... javac: file not found: src\com\rs2hd\util\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Compiling shops... javac: file not found: src\com\rs2hd\content\Shops.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: src\com\rs2hd\content\ShopHandler.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Complete. Press any key to continue...[/code]

item.title: Whoever helps me
item.dc:creator: @round round
item.description:
@round wrote:

Are you sure your version of JDK is 24?

Read full topic

item.title: Whoever helps me
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

We don’t offer rewards on this community, help is free.

Read full topic

item.title: Whoever helps me
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Hello I’m having a problem with my new 562 server compiler. I have everything right in the compiler so don’t even ask that. I know I have to compile it as an administrator because I have windows 7, but I still get the same thing… This is my code I use:

@echo off title rs2hd compiler echo Preparing... mkdir bin cd src copy log4j.xml .. cd .. move log4j.xml bin/ echo Compiling nets... "C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/net/*.java echo Compiling models... "C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/model/*.java echo Compiling packet handlers... "C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/packethandler/*.java echo Compiling utils... "C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/util/*.java echo Compiling shops... "C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/content/Shops.java "C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/content/ShopHandler.java echo Complete. pause

This is the error I get every time:

Preparing... A subdirectory or file bin already exists. The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannot find the file specified. The system cannot find the file specified. Compiling nets... javac: file not found: src\com\rs2hd\net\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Compiling models... javac: file not found: src\com\rs2hd\model\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Compiling packet handlers... javac: file not found: src\com\rs2hd\packethandler\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Compiling utils... javac: file not found: src\com\rs2hd\util\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Compiling shops... javac: file not found: src\com\rs2hd\content\Shops.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: src\com\rs2hd\content\ShopHandler.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Complete. Press any key to continue...

Read full topic
